adHeader: Santa Clara Property Manager - Management Licensed Broker & Contractor
adDetails: http://www.aptsmanager.com Visit our full website. Property Management Company. Full Service Leasing, day to day management and maintenance.  We specialize in keeping your apartments fully occupied and well maintained. Low rates.  Licensed Real Estate Broker and General Contractor.  As a 3rd generation Real Estate professional, we can take care of all your property needs.  We manage Single Family - Fourplex, & Multi-Family 5+ Units. Apologies, we do not manage condos or vacation rentals/temporary housing. We service San Jose, Sunnyvale, Mountain View, Santa Clara and surrounding areas. We currently manage 96 residential units and are ready to manage your properties.
